snippet: To deal with the probable congestion and delays, business travelers may need self-reliance and flexibility. “The most important thing to pack is patience,” one expert said.
abstract: Republican and Democratic national conventions, along with the likelihood of an above-normal hurricane season, may lead to general airline travel disruptions; business travelers may need self-reliance and flexibility to deal with the probable congestion and delays.
lead_paragraph: To deal with the probable congestion and delays, business travelers may need self-reliance and flexibility. “The most important thing to pack is patience,” one expert said.

headline.seo: Political Conventions, Olympics and Storms Clog Summer Travel
